turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to a order caramel macchiato from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: that's a great drink. what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and finally, which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so the order is 1 venti iced caramel macchiato from starbucks in the birchwood mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total, did you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the drink will be ready in 10 minutes. i've sent the receipt to you via text message. did you need anything else?
